attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Respect all the over 65's for free 'bus travel in England,  Wales  and Scotland. We are all UK citizens and dreserve the same rights regardless of UK boundaries. Make 'bus passes to be used in all areas.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/UKfreebuspasses/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
